page.title: 06 TRAFFIC SURVEY
page.content: We did a survey on the M1, which is a very busy motorway, the A5, which is a Roman Road called Watling Street and Crick Rd., which links two villages. We found that the M1 was busier than either of the other two roads, as expected. We were surprised to find that there were more motorbikes on the A5 than on the M1. We were also surprised to find that there were no coaches on the A5. We surveyed the M1 on June 11th at 10 am. The other two roads were both surveyed on the same day during the afternoon. We carried out the survey for 15 minutes on each road.
